short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, users can quickly and easily convert ETH to and from units such as gwei & wei being the smallest unit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, users can quickly and easily convert ETH to and from units such as wei & gwei. The extension is simple to use and can be easily accessed from the browser's toolbar. It is a useful tool for Ethereum users who need to make frequent unit conversions while using the Ethereum network."
